Reviews.Title: We should have sent it back for a refund
Reviews.Author: Phil Gurzi
Reviews.Content: This system does not justify $1400.00 and should have been sent back for a full refund. The DVR fan is very loud and we thought a couple cameras were bad. We contacted the seller and they immediately sent us another system in which we traded out what we needed to but only to find it made no difference, it's in the quality of this product. We had already ran the cords to where each camera goes so taking it all down would be to much of a hassle, so that's why we didn't do a return. The only thing we can do is buy a better camera to make the system useful. While viewing from the monitor you can see okay, but in viewing the recordings the quality is horrible.
